title: Magic Conch
info: The Magic Conch is an item that teleports the player to the Ocean furthest from the player. Like the Magic Mirror, it can be used limitlessly. It can be found randomly in Sandstone Chests, Oasis Crates, and Mirage Crates.
stat:

ToolMiscellaneous

TooltipIf you listen closely, you can hear the ocean
